formattedContent.headline: Vibe Coding
formattedContent.content: Forget line-by-line code. Describe your app, and AI builds it. Perfect for rapid prototyping. Impact: Go from idea to functional demo in hours.

formattedContent.headline: Pure Vibe Coding
formattedContent.content: AI takes the wheel. Best for throwaway projects where speed trumps perfection. Impact: Validate ideas without massive upfront investment.

formattedContent.headline: Responsible AI
formattedContent.content: You're the architect, AI is the builder. Review, test, and own the AI-generated code. Impact: Build robust apps with AI as your partner.

formattedContent.headline: AI Studio
formattedContent.content: No-code app generation. Describe your idea, get a live app. Deploy with one click. Impact: Launch your first app this week, even without coding skills.

formattedContent.headline: Firebase Studio
formattedContent.content: Full-stack apps, AI-powered. Add databases, auth, and more. Impact: Build complete applications faster than ever.

formattedContent.headline: Gemini Code Assist
formattedContent.content: AI-assisted coding in your IDE. Generates, explains, and tests code. Impact: Supercharge your existing workflow with AI.

formattedContent.headline: Vibe Coding vs Traditional
formattedContent.content: Focus on the outcome, not the syntax. AI handles the low-level details. Impact: Free up your time to focus on strategy and growth.
